channel.title: days old on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in days old on Barefoot Rob

item.description: 12:47am CDT Saturday 6 May 2000 Great news!!! Today I am 11,000 days old!! Molly has organized a lovely incredible afternoon! The plan (as I know it): Ultimate tournament in the late morning, meet the gang at UH entrance 5 at 1pm, play a round of disc golf on UH campus, watch Gladiators (oh, that reminds me; I’m s’posed to call my dad when we figure out when the movie is; maybe he can go!
